alert.note: Alert for Hughes; Pontotoc; Seminole (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 26 at 10:28PM CST until February 26 at 11:00PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CST FOR SEMINOLE...NORTHEASTERN PONTOTOC AND HUGHES COUNTIES... At 1028 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cromwell to 3 miles southeast of Bowlegs, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Seminole, Holdenville, Wewoka, Konawa, Wetumka, Bowlegs, Dustin, Calvin, Cromwell, Stuart, Lamar, Sasakwa, Horntown, Yeager, Atwood, Spaulding and Lima. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A tornado watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
